name: Laser Scan Interactive point cloud
description:
Left Thumbstick to walk around

The Oculus Rift S "B" button to teleport target then the right thumbstick down to teleport.

You can open the door to the building by touching the doorknob, turn the Valve handle by touching the handle. (Only the big one in the middle) Start the monorail by touching the forward support beam.

You can pick up the rear pump motor touching it and squeezing the controls. You can also pick up the small tank skid
